data.quote: Those who seek improvement, improve.
data.author: Ryze, Riot Games

data.quote: How can anybody miss home? Home is all around.
data.author: Neeko, Riot Games

data.quote: Don't stop when you are tired. STOP when you are DONE.
data.author: unknown

data.quote: Go as far as you can see, when you get there, you will be able to se further.
data.author: Thomas Carlyle

data.quote: If you are brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: I never lose, i either win or learn.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Do or do not. There is no try
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: The first step is you have to say that you CAN
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: You always gain by giving love
data.author: Reese Withespoon

data.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me
data.author: Carol Burnett

data.quote: If you can do great things, do small things in a great way
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Don't watch the clock, do what he does, KEEP GOING
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Words are tricky. Better to speak with colors and emotion!
data.author: Neeko, Riot Games

data.quote: I will learn! I will grow! I will... Neeko!
data.author: Neeko, Riot Games

data.quote: Great Things never came from comfort zones
data.author: unknown

data.quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen
data.author: Conan O'Brien

data.quote: A Smooth sea never made a skilled sailor
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: Every place is beautiful. Every place is danger. Is danger... beautiful?
data.author: Neeko, Riot Games

data.quote: Nothing works unless you do
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Don't wait the opportunity. Create it
data.author: unknown
